movies.title: Patterns of Evidence: Exodus
movies.plot: What is the validity of history found in the Bible? Is it fact or fiction? What does the hard evidence really have to say about the foundational story of the Old Testament: the Exodus out of Egypt? An in-depth investigation by documentary filmmaker Tim Mahoney searches for answers to these questions amid startling new finds that may change traditional views of history and the Bible.

biography.bio: Rabbi Prof. David Hartman was a leading thinker among philosophers of contemporary Judaism and an internationally renowned Jewish author. In 1971, Prof. Hartman immigrated to Israel from Montreal with his wife Barbara and their five children, a move which he viewed as an essential part of his mission to encourage a greater understanding between Jews of diverse affiliations - both in Israel and the Diaspora - and to help build a more pluralistic and tolerant Israeli society. It is with this unique vision that David Hartman founded the Shalom Hartman Institute in Jerusalem in 1976, dedicating it to the name of his father. At the institute, Prof. Hartman built a team of research scholars in the study and teaching of classical Jewish sources and contemporary issues of Israeli society and Jewish life. David Hartman's work emphasized the centrality of the rebirth of the State of Israel - the challenge as well as the opportunities it offers to contemporary Judaism. His teachings drew upon the tradition of Orthodox Judaism and emphasize religious pluralism, both among Jews and in interfaith relations.
biography.name: David Hartman

biography.bio: Michael Medved was born on October 3, 1948 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. He is a writer and actor, known for Hollywood vs. Religion (1994), Good Entertainment, with Michael Medved (2001) and Fuck (2005). He has been married to Diane Edwards since January 27, 1985. They have three children.
biography.name: Michael Medved

biography.bio: Benjamin Netanyahu was born on October 21, 1949 in Tel Aviv, Israel. He is married to Sarah Netanyahu. They have two children. He was previously married to First wife and Second wife.
biography.name: Benjamin Netanyahu

biography.bio: Shimon Peres was born on August 2, 1923 in Wiszniewo, Poland as Szymon Persky. He was an actor, known for Blessed Is the Match: The Life and Death of Hannah Senesh (2008), In Search of Peace (2001) and Yitzhak Rabin: Warrior - Peacemaker (1998). He was married to Sonya Gelman. He died on September 28, 2016 in Ramat Gan, Israel.
biography.name: Shimon Peres
